title: T206 PSA 4 SOV 150 Tinker and Chance Port $300 each, OM Johnson
author: B O'Brien

posts.post_title: T206 PSA 4 SOV 150 Tinker and Chance Port $300 each, OM Johnson
posts.post_content:
Hello all,
I was able to upgrade my Old Mill spot with a nice VG Lajoie last week, so I have an extra Johnson SGC 30.  This one also has some really cool transfer that is worth some looking into (more than just the OM line on at left).


I have an extra Tinker Sovereign 150 PSA 4.  It is a solid VGEX, seen better and worse, so not bad.  It is part of the group scan (Chance could be talked away too, also SOV 150 back!).  Great deep color!  I would like to keep one or the other for the backs spot.

Tinker $300
Chance $300
Johnson $SOLD

Paypal transfers best.

Thanks,
Bob
[url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url]
